text:
Canda#sAmavatvEkaviq(gm)qSaH stOmO# vairAqja(gm) sAma# miqtrAvaru#Nau dEqvatAq balaqM dravi#Na-mUqd^^rdhvAmA ti#ShTha paq~gktistvAq Canda#sAmavatu triNavatrayastriq(gm)qSau stOmau# SAkvararaivaqtE sAma#nIq bRuhaqspati#rdEqvatAq varcOq dravi#Na-mIqdRu~g cA$nyAqdRu~g cai#tAqdRu~g ca# pratiqdRu~g ca# miqtaScaq saMmi#taScaq saBa#rAH | 
SuqkrajyO#tiSca ciqtrajyO#tiSca saqtyajyO#tiScaq jyOti#ShmA(gg)Sca saqtyaSca#rtaqpASca - [  ] 25
